statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, activity_type FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE activity_type = 'running';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_type = 'Walking' ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING readings_count > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM human_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Exercise' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, impact_score FROM human_activities WHERE impact_score > 7.5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_type, reading_timestamp FROM environmental_sensor_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading_type, reading_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_value FROM environmental_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE location LIKE 'Lab%' AND reading_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT e.sensor_name, h.activity_name, h.impact_score FROM environmental_sensor_data e JOIN human_activities h ON e.sensor_id = h.activity_id WHERE h.impact_score > 0.8 ORDER BY h.impact_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(reading_value) AS max_value, MIN(reading_value) AS min_value FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE reading_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM activity_log WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_id, impact_value FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_value > 10 ORDER BY impact_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name DESC, reading_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_value DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE reading_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND reading_value < 30
SELECT log_id, activity_type, user_id, location FROM activity_log WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%' AND activity_type = 'Cooking' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY impact_timestamp
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT activity_name, timestamp FROM Activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Impact WHERE severity > 7 AND impact_type = 'Natural Disaster';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' AND value > 50;
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT activity_name, description FROM Activity WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT * FROM Impact WHERE impact_type = 'Natural Disaster' ORDER BY severity DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, measurement_value FROM SensorData ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT * FROM LocationData WHERE city='New York'
SELECT area_name, city, country FROM LocationData WHERE country='USA'
SELECT * FROM ActivityData WHERE activity_type='Running'
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY measurement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, measurement_value FROM SensorData WHERE measurement_unit = 'Celsius' ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description, activity_timestamp FROM ActivityData WHERE activity_type = 'Exercise' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_timestamp) = 5;
SELECT * FROM ImpactData WHERE impact_category = 'Natural Disaster' AND impact_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM LocationData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80 ORDER BY city ASC, country DESC;
